name: uMMORPG Website Dark Theme
description: A simple tark mode to the uMMORPG website. More eyes saved!

user.name: Michael Cox
user.about: Just your friendly neighbourhood game developer making dark themes for websites that don't seem to like people who stare at screens all day. Don't mind me.

additional_info:
Version 1.0. Written by Michael Cox.

Simple and automatic. Changes all background colours to dark greys and blacks and sets all body text to white.

Works on uMMORPG website. Documentation is not modified because the documentation is hosted on Google Docs and making a theme for the documentation will apply to Google. To darken the documentation, use a Google Dark Mode. Additions to these theme can be written in the future to apply to only the documentation, although that trusts the developer not to change the documentation URL.
